about_the_game:
What is Sparkour?

Sparkour is a game all about speed, agility, and on-the-fly strategy. Use your sick parkour tricks and various power-ups to speed into victory! Against your friends, bots, or strangers, use traps, projectiles and more to stop them in their tracks. Or, chain together multiple, stylish skills to build up speed and boost right through them.


Use these skills together and become the ultimate human projectile, in the most intense, stylistic, and frienemy-forming battle you've ever seen.

Featuring...

  • A First-Person Platforming/Racing hybrid.
  • Play with your friends, strangers, or even computer players.
  • Perform trick-chains to gather up speed!
  • Use various power-ups against your opponents!
  • Find all the secret paths in the maps to gain the ultimate advantage!
  • Show off your style with different colors, clothes, and builds.
  • Featuring an amazing set of bouncy tunes by iamsleepless!
detailed_description:
Sparkour Alpha Demo!

Come and play the Alpha Demo! We've released an free early look at Sparkour that allows you to enjoy a small snippet of the game! As stated in the title, this is a late Alpha version of the game, so expect some bugs and unfinished edges here and there. Because we're a small team, we'd really appreciate your feedback, so we've integrated a feedback feature in the game for you to give us some details about how the game feels for you.


About the Game

What is Sparkour?

Sparkour is a game all about speed, agility, and on-the-fly strategy. Use your sick parkour tricks and various power-ups to speed into victory! Against your friends, bots, or strangers, use traps, projectiles and more to stop them in their tracks. Or, chain together multiple, stylish skills to build up speed and boost right through them.


Use these skills together and become the ultimate human projectile, in the most intense, stylistic, and frienemy-forming battle you've ever seen.

Featuring...

  • A First-Person Platforming/Racing hybrid.
  • Play with your friends, strangers, or even computer players.
  • Perform trick-chains to gather up speed!
  • Use various power-ups against your opponents!
  • Find all the secret paths in the maps to gain the ultimate advantage!
  • Show off your style with different colors, clothes, and builds.
  • Featuring an amazing set of bouncy tunes by iamsleepless!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Dual-Core; 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Note: These specifications are not final and may change after release. Please stay posted for more information!
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Dual-Core; 2.5+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Note: These specifications are not final and may change after release. Please stay posted for more information!

short_description: Sparkour is a 4-Player First-Person Racing game, where you and your friends use speed, agility, and strategy to boost yourself across the finish line!
